import React, {Component} from 'react' import {List,ListItem,Paper} from '@material-ui/core' import ReactItem from './ReactItem' import FilteredList from './FilteredList' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import CardDeck from 'react-bootstrap/CardDeck' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import ListGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ListGroup' import ListGroupItem from 'react-bootstrap/ListGroupItem' class DisplayList extends Component { createItem = item => { return ( {item.location} {item.meal} {item.name} {item.price} this.props.addItem(item)} style={{backgroundColor:"green", color:"white"}}> Add to Cart ) } render() { const itemList = this.props.list const mapList = itemList.map(this.createItem) return ( {mapList}

{mapList.length ? "" : "No results found."}

 ) } } export default DisplayList
